title: Kindred or Thresh
body: {{champion:203}} {{champion:412}} As you can see in the icons and the title, I've been trying to decide either to buy Kindred, but at the same time I would want to buy thresh. Thresh is a support and a fighter which i like but Kindred is a marksman. Would I please get feed back. Thanks.

replies.body: Kindred gets cold pretty quick, boring mechanics without much flare. Thresh imo is one of the funnest supports in the game

Thresh :3
Looks cooler when you make duh plays ;)

Which role do you prefer to play? Support or ADC? There's your answer!

As a Support main (Specifically Thresh) I would say Thresh, but your personal opinion (and others) may differ.
